Text: WOW, the Mono versions, thank you very very much. The Fab Four Rocks after 40 years, really!

zato1

Only these albums were mastered as MONO editions by EMI/APPLE in addition to the stereo releases (differs from Stereo Box-Set), these are unique mono-masters by the studio not downsampled versions from stereo

Please Please Me
With The Beatles
A Hard Days Night
Beatles For Sale
Help!

The Beatles

"Defeat audio cache      : No "

http://wiki.hydrogenaudio.org/index.php?title=EAC_Drive_Configuration#Drive_Options

Are you CERTAIN your drive has no audio cache? If not then your rips are not accurate and should be redone. 

Always leave the option to YES, even if it doesn't. This won't make others question your rip :)

Listen to this, I've converted all the .flac files to .wav (96000 Hz, 32 bits, MONO, since this rip is in fact in stereo) while using Switch Sound File Converter and by God it sounds ten times better. Download the program and try it, you won't be disappointed.
